rules_text: When Mimicry Vat enters, exile target creature. Then conjure a card named Unstable Shapeshifter into exile. When Mimicry Vat is no longer on the battlefield, put the exiled permanents onto the battlefield under their owner's control. [i](Unstable Shapeshifter is a 0/1 Shapeshifter creature that costs {3}{U} with “Whenever another creature enters, Unstable Shapeshifter becomes a copy of that creature, except it has this ability.”)[/i]
